alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Gallatin Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 2:25PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Gallatin County through 315 PM MDT... At 223 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms developing over the Bridger Mountains, or 18 miles north of Bozeman, moving slowly to the northeast. HAZARD...Heavy rain, winds in excess of 40 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Menard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
